text: sel su issneun myeochilgan-e geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul tteoollila. iteuljjaee seoduleuneun jaga issdamyeon geuege joega doeji anh-eumyeo, neujneun jaga issdamyeon geuegedo joega doeji anh-euni ineun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jaleul wiham-ila. geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeong-oehago geubunkkelo geudaedeul-i sojibdoel geos-im-eul alla
